summary: Prompt: Meet-Cute in the produce aisle
body:
Prompt: Meet-Cute in the produce aisle

Thank you to @theobligatedklutz for the story Idea i hope you like it♡♡

TJ POV:

It was a normal night for me, my mom sent me to the grocery store to grab some stuff for dinner tonight. I never thought I’d meet someone who would make my stomach turn to knots, and yet here he was, in the produce section fustrated with a screaming child who was probably no older than 2.

“What! Tell me what you want!!” He raised his voice as the child started kicking him. I walked up to them and put my hand on the cute strangers back.

“Having trouble?” I smiled at him softly and he sighed in response. “I dont know what she wants she just keeps screaming” i looked at the little girl who was still screaming.

“How old is she? Is she teething?” I questioned and the boy looked like he had an epiphany. “Oh my gosh! I love you! Youre brilliant!” I laughed and rubbed the back of my neck as he rummaged through his bag and pulled out a teething ring handing it to the toddler. I glanced down at his hand and noticed he didnt have a ring, so he probably wasnt married.

“Not used to your girlfriend leaving you with the baby?” He looked at me confused and then his eyes went wide. “Huh? Oh! No! Nonono! Im not- Shes not mine. Lydia is my cousin, Im babysitting while my aunt and uncle are out.”

“Oh I see an act of thoughtfulness” I smiled at him, fully knowing I was bright red. He was really cute, apart of me wanted to ask for his number but I wasnt even sure he liked guys.

“Oh Im TJ by the way, nice to meet you” I put my hand out and smiled. He took my hand and shook it and I felt my heart jump “Cyrus, nice to meet you” i pulled my hand away and started to look at the tomatoes at the same time as Cyrus. We reached for the same tomatoes and ended up holding hands again. I laughed softly.

“So Cyrus, do you have a girlfriend? I find it hard to believe that you’re single” Cyrus turned red and laughed. “Um no actually I’m pretty single. Im not- uh Yeah Im not seeing anyone” He became flustered and I felt bad for pushing. “Oh yeah me neither, my parents keep trying to set me up with girls but….” I trailed off and continued to look at the tomatoes. “But..? But what?” He was a curious person, I chuckled. “Well… Lets just say Ive never been that into girls” He looked up at me wide eyed, “Yeah me either” I smiled, I guess he was into guys. We fell into silence and continued to gather our groceries

“Um hey, Cyrus?”

“Yeah?”

“So I dont- I dont know if youd be interested.. and you- you don’t have to bu-but maybe youd like want to meet up again this friday and get like coffee.. maybe dinner or something” I was flustered and my face was bright red as I looked over at Cyrus waiting a response.

“Are you asking me on a date?” Cyrus replied flirtatiously with a smile on his face.

“I uh- yeah.. But only if you want to!” Cyrus laughed at me and handed me his phone. “I think I’d like that. Pick me up at 7 I’ll text you my address”

I smiled and typed my number into his phone handing it back to him. He smiled and waved goodbye, I watched as he walked away. I never thought I’d meet someone so adorable and at the grocery store nonetheless..

blog.title: hella bella
blog.description:
hella bella // 16

ravenclaw, taurus, feminist, self-acclaimed musical theatre geek, DWSA enthusiast, female chandler bing, member of the andy mientus protection squad, honorary girlsie, professional "and peggy," guts & glory

body:
Holy Shit

When Cyrus comes out to Jonah, I wonder if he’s gonna say something like “I used to have a crush on you” and they’ll giggle about it, bc knowing good ‘ol Disney there’s no way he could say “I’m gay, or even an "I like guys” or an “I don’t like girls/(enter girl on the show’s name here) that way” would be too bold

So can you believe we’re probably going to see Cyrus admit his longtime past crush on Jonah 2 years later, after he was obvivious this whole time…and he doesn’t even like him anymore? And he’s getting together with TJ instead, whilst Jonah will probably be involved with getting them together somehow?

Damn, this is one wild show

tags: get that shit out of the tag
summary: A tyrus shipper just told someone to kill them selves because that person ships jyrus and not tyrus. I genuinely haven’t seen...
question: A tyrus shipper just told someone to kill them selves because that person ships jyrus and not tyrus. I genuinely haven’t seen any jyrus shipper tell a tyrus shipper to kill them selves. Everyone should know that it’s not okay to tell a person to kill them selves because of a different opinion.  No matter who you ship it’s not freaking okay to do that, literally ever. I’m just really annoyed. And if any of y’all don’t believe me for some reason I am telling the truth. I wouldn’t lie about this.
answer:
I haven’t been in the tag in a week so I don’t know anything about this, and I don’t want to put one ship against another.

So let me just say as a general PSA: there is literally zero situations where it’s okay to tell someone to kill themselves. Full stop. No exceptions.

blog.name: illbeyourreasonwhy
blog.title: I'm with you all the way
blog.description: Lou | 18 | Currently in the middle of a sexuality crisis | Technically a multifandom blog but it's mostly Andi Mack |icon by @judgemental-llama - header by @spidaerman|

summary: Andi Mack Admiration Discussion Day 7: Scene that made you happy cry I mean swing scene 2.0 was more hyperventilating than...
body:
Andi Mack Admiration Discussion

Day 7: Scene that made you happy cry

I mean swing scene 2.0 was more hyperventilating than crying so I don’t think that counts

Well I mean there’s probably a full list of moments this show made me cry because it somehow manages to turn me into a fucking emotional mess every week

If we’re talking full-on crying then I gotta go with Buffy’s mom coming home. I turn into a sobbing mess every single time I see it. I already talked about it, but seriously. Every. Damn. Time.

But I also want to mention Cyrus coming out to Buffy because even if I don’t usually cry, I always get choked up.

And I mean, like I said, I get at least misty-eyed almost every episode so I think this show knows what it’s doing

blog.name: tyrusisthetea
blog.title: Niceberg.Lol
blog.description: Tyrus Stan

body:
Our Bench (Tyrus)

A/N: I’m sorry in advance, made this during social studies because I was bored. Have a nice day! 💚

A bright warm sunlight settled over the park as Tj sat on a bench, waiting for Cyrus to show up. The swift summer breeze cut through Tj, making him shiver. Tj pulled the arms of his hoodie down, hiding the goosebumps he had. Tj wasn’t even that cold, he was just nervous, or scared. He couldn’t decide which one.

Cyrus walked through the park’s entrance, well more like ran. Cyrus walked past the swings, breathing heavily. The swings were their place, they met there. So what if it was because Cyrus was singing his stupid swing song. It didn’t matter, not to Cyrus or Tj. They really connected that time, but not as much as the second time. The second time was like a movie scene without the kiss. Cyrus wished he could go back to that moment and close the gap between him and Tj. I mean he could’ve at least told Tj he was gay, but he wasn’t ready. Maybe he would be soon, hopefully.

Cyrus stumbled to the bench where Tj sat. Tj grabbed Cyrus’s shoulders before he could fall face first into the bench. Cyrus’s breath hitched for a moment because of Tj’s touch. Both of the boys faces had a pink tint to them. Cyrus repositioned himself and sat on the bench, Tj’s arm was still around him.

“Sorry I’m late Tj! Buffy wanted me to help her pick out her outfit for the wedding and I couldn’t say no!” Cyrus spoke so fast that all Tj could focus on was his lips. If only Tj could kiss those lips right here, right now. Cyrus sat in silence waiting for Tj to respond.

“You’re fine…” Tj mumbled not taking his eyes off of Cyrus’s totally kissable lips. He was right, it was fine, it gave Tj more time to figure out what he was going to say. What was Tj going to confess to Cyrus? This question pulled Tj out of his daze.

“Cyrus I need to tell you something… important.” Tj took his arm off of Cyrus’s shoulder, Cyrus immediately missed it’s warmth. Tj stared at his sneakers, trying to find the words to say.

“What is it? Are you okay?” Cyrus’s heart dropped when he saw Tj speechless. Tj always had something to say, why not now? Cyrus wanted to pull Tj into the biggest bear hug, but he didn’t.

“I…I don’t know how to say this.” Tears started to form in Tj’s big green eyes, but he blinked them away. Cyrus grabbed Tj’s shaky hand, “Tj… you can tell me anything.”

Tj took a deep breath and tried to calm himself down. Cyrus squeezed his hand, causing Tj to look up at Cyrus’s longing brown eyes. Tj got lost in them for a moment, until the tears came back and blurred his eyes.

“Cyrus… I’m gay.” Tj’s voice broke and a single tear streamed down his face and landed on Cyrus’s hand. It was Cyrus’s turn to cry. Cyrus rubbed his thumb along Tj’s knuckles.

“Me too.” Cyrus chocked out, feeling a weight being lifted off his shoulders. Tj’s gaze instantly landed on Cyrus’s glossy eyes. A smile formed on each others faces. Tj quickly pulled Cyrus into a big hug. They held eachother as if a gust of wind would sweep the other away.

“It is because of me?” Tj whispered into Cyrus’s ear. Cyrus instantly stiffened up, feeling his face get hot.

“You really have to feed your ego right now?” Cyrus chuckled rubbing Tj’s back. Tj pulled away from the hug, overall regretting it because he was cold now.

“Is that a yes?” Tj questioned, hoping he didnt just make a fool of himself. Cyrus stared deeply into Tj’s eyes. A small grin formed on his face as he intertwined his fingers with Tj’s.

“Yes!”

reblog.comment:
Our Bench (Tyrus)

A/N: I’m sorry in advance, made this during social studies because I was bored. Have a nice day! 💚

A bright warm sunlight settled over the park as Tj sat on a bench, waiting for Cyrus to show up. The swift summer breeze cut through Tj, making him shiver. Tj pulled the arms of his hoodie down, hiding the goosebumps he had. Tj wasn’t even that cold, he was just nervous, or scared. He couldn’t decide which one.

Cyrus walked through the park’s entrance, well more like ran. Cyrus walked past the swings, breathing heavily. The swings were their place, they met there. So what if it was because Cyrus was singing his stupid swing song. It didn’t matter, not to Cyrus or Tj. They really connected that time, but not as much as the second time. The second time was like a movie scene without the kiss. Cyrus wished he could go back to that moment and close the gap between him and Tj. I mean he could’ve at least told Tj he was gay, but he wasn’t ready. Maybe he would be soon, hopefully.

Cyrus stumbled to the bench where Tj sat. Tj grabbed Cyrus’s shoulders before he could fall face first into the bench. Cyrus’s breath hitched for a moment because of Tj’s touch. Both of the boys faces had a pink tint to them. Cyrus repositioned himself and sat on the bench, Tj’s arm was still around him.

“Sorry I’m late Tj! Buffy wanted me to help her pick out her outfit for the wedding and I couldn’t say no!” Cyrus spoke so fast that all Tj could focus on was his lips. If only Tj could kiss those lips right here, right now. Cyrus sat in silence waiting for Tj to respond.

“You’re fine…” Tj mumbled not taking his eyes off of Cyrus’s totally kissable lips. He was right, it was fine, it gave Tj more time to figure out what he was going to say. What was Tj going to confess to Cyrus? This question pulled Tj out of his daze.

“Cyrus I need to tell you something… important.” Tj took his arm off of Cyrus’s shoulder, Cyrus immediately missed it’s warmth. Tj stared at his sneakers, trying to find the words to say.

“What is it? Are you okay?” Cyrus’s heart dropped when he saw Tj speechless. Tj always had something to say, why not now? Cyrus wanted to pull Tj into the biggest bear hug, but he didn’t.

“I…I don’t know how to say this.” Tears started to form in Tj’s big green eyes, but he blinked them away. Cyrus grabbed Tj’s shaky hand, “Tj… you can tell me anything.”

Tj took a deep breath and tried to calm himself down. Cyrus squeezed his hand, causing Tj to look up at Cyrus’s longing brown eyes. Tj got lost in them for a moment, until the tears came back and blurred his eyes.

“Cyrus… I’m gay.” Tj’s voice broke and a single tear streamed down his face and landed on Cyrus’s hand. It was Cyrus’s turn to cry. Cyrus rubbed his thumb along Tj’s knuckles.

“Me too.” Cyrus chocked out, feeling a weight being lifted off his shoulders. Tj’s gaze instantly landed on Cyrus’s glossy eyes. A smile formed on each others faces. Tj quickly pulled Cyrus into a big hug. They held eachother as if a gust of wind would sweep the other away.

“It is because of me?” Tj whispered into Cyrus’s ear. Cyrus instantly stiffened up, feeling his face get hot.

“You really have to feed your ego right now?” Cyrus chuckled rubbing Tj’s back. Tj pulled away from the hug, overall regretting it because he was cold now.

“Is that a yes?” Tj questioned, hoping he didnt just make a fool of himself. Cyrus stared deeply into Tj’s eyes. A small grin formed on his face as he intertwined his fingers with Tj’s.

“Yes!”

blog.name: bandi-mack
blog.title: ready for tomorrow
blog.description: annabelle•16•she/her•love my friends• very Serious art >:^)

tags: sorry i'm going to tag a couple ships to get the word out
title: hi everyone!
body:
I wanted to do something for the friendom on valentine’s day because so many of you are just absolutely superb and lovely!!! soooooooo

whoever reblogs this will receive *drum-roll*  a beautifully horrendous ms paint-esque valentine with an equally horrible andi mack pun on it in their inbox on the 14th yaaaaaaay

some little things:

  • there’s about half of them that might be a bit of an eye-strain due to the painfully loud colors. if you need one that isn’t, please let me know! :)
  • I have no idea how many of you guys will want one, but I’m fairly positive I won’t have enough for all of them to be individual sksksksksks (if you and another blog get the same one you’re best friends now sorry it’s the rules)
  • if you could do your best to remember to have your inbox/submissions open on the 14th, that’d help me out a lot!
  • there might be a bit of a delay depending on my school work so I apologize in advance if yours doesn’t arrive until later that day
  • and uhhh that’s all! thank you all for being so kind and amazing!

if you get this one I’m so sorry agdghds
